Feature: Ability to use latest survey results in the survey itself
Start survey from a specific page (helpful when editing)
Show all pages at once (helpful for editing or printing out whole survey)
Time stamps recorded for each question and page interaction
Progress bar bar that updates on each question interaction

Implementation: Just use markdown on options and buttons.

In the sd_ui() function, use:
custom_css = “custom.css”, where “custom.css” is a custom css file.

Feature: Pass parameters through the url, e.g. to track user IDs
Implementation:
Insert url parameters with a ?, e.g. mysurvey.shinyapps.io/?id_a=123&id_b=456
then obtain the parameters in the server with sd_get_url_pars()

Feature: Redirect users to an external url
Admin page with password login to preview / download data, pause survey, etc.
Implementation: sd_config(admin_page = TRUE), then access with url, e.g. https://mysurvey.shinyapps.io/?admin

Feature: Form validation (limit input based on question type)
